artist: artist: Tosa Mitsusada (double page 3); artist: Tosa Mitsuyasu (double page 4); artist: Yamaguchi Soken (double pages 7, 11); artist: Takehara Shunsensai (double pages 14, 25, 69); artist: Maruyama Ōkyo (double page 15); artist: Shimokōbe Ikei (double pages 16, 39); artist: Kinoshita Ōju (double page 18); artist: Oku Bunmei (double page 37); artist: Tanaka Totsugen (double pages 45, 56); author: Akisato Ritō
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with light blue cover with embossed and printed design of trees, mountain and clouds on front and back cover; white label with black text on cover; some text pages; text page near front of volume with border with repeating flower, scroll and lantern (?) pattern; images include street scenes, expansive aerial views of landscapes, buildings and bridges, painter's workshop making and selling hanging scrolls, travelers in the countryside, group of ladies strolling with a servant man carrying a large umbrella, men with a horse under a blossoming cherry tree, mounted soldier wearing armor with his horse swimming in water, barges with many figures, battle scene with swordsman on horseback
markings: in LRC of first page, in red: stamp
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō meisho zue 東海道名所圖會)
title: Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights along the Tōkaidō, vol. 1
